intro: Rondeletia × obscura, commonly known as the dark rondeletia, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes many species of shrubs and climbers. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and clusters of small, fragrant, white or pale pink flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for garden cultivation in warm climates.
